skinType.name: oily
routine: Cleanse with a foaming or gel-based cleaners
Use a clay mask once a week
tips: Avoid over-washing your face - twice a day is enough.
Blotting papers can help control shine during the day.

skinType.name: Dry
routine: Use a hydrating toner with glycerin
Hyaluronic acid serum is a must
tips: Avoid hot water;use lukewarm water for cleansing.
Use a humidifier to add moisture to the air.

skinType.name: Combination
routine: Use Gel cleanser for balanced skin
Use vitamin C in the morning
Light moisturizer on T-zone,richer on dry areas
tips: Customize your routine for different parts of your face.
Multi-masking helps address different areas of your face.
Don't use harsh products that dry out dry areas in your face.
